schwaebische.de.113476.1: Biker reacts quickly and prevents worse
schwaebische.de.113476.2: On Friday evening there was a traffic accident on the road between Machtolsheim and Merklingen in which a motorcyclist was only slightly injured thanks to his quick reaction.
schwaebische.de.113476.4: A 44-year-old car driver wanted to turn left in her VW from Merklingen at around 9:30 p.m. onto Landesstraße 1230 in the direction of Machtolsheim.
schwaebische.de.113476.5: In doing so, she overlooked the 24-year-old motorcyclist with right of way coming from the direction of Nellingen.
schwaebische.de.113476.6: In the event of a collision, the hand and foot brake levers fly away
schwaebische.de.113476.7: The biker tried to avoid the car, but still brushed against the rear of the vehicle.
schwaebische.de.113476.8: The hand and foot brake levers on the Suzuki were torn off during the grazing process and the driver was no longer able to brake.
schwaebische.de.113476.9: With presence of mind, he steered his motorcycle into the green strait next to the road and let it roll to a stop without falling.
schwaebische.de.113476.11: Due to the collision with the car, the biker nevertheless suffered an injury to his leg and had to be treated in a clinic.
np-coburg.de.105627.1: Mamming: Corona mass infection: 174 harvest workers infected
np-coburg.de.105627.2: After a mass corona infection on a large vegetable farm in Mamming, Lower Bavaria, almost 500 people are under quarantine and are no longer allowed to leave the company.
np-coburg.de.105627.3: A security service monitors the ban on going out.
np-coburg.de.105627.4: A total of 174 harvest workers tested positive for the corona pathogen Sars-CoV-2 during the series check, as the Dingolfing-Landau district office announced on Saturday evening.
np-coburg.de.105627.5: "To avoid further spread, we unfortunately have to take this step to protect the population," said District Administrator Werner Bumeder (CSU).
np-coburg.de.105627.6: Seven employees had previously been infected in the company - this was the reason for the series test.
np-coburg.de.105627.7: The business is a large vegetable farm that grows strawberries, cucumbers, cabbage and beetroot - but the cucumbers are only for jars.
np-coburg.de.105627.8: Mamming is a rural community with a good 3300 inhabitants not far from Dingolfing with its large BMW plant.
np-coburg.de.105627.9: Bumeder appealed to the citizens to remain calm: "According to our information, this is a closed group of people".
np-coburg.de.105627.10: In the yard, infected and uninfected employees were separated, and the area is now surrounded by a barricade fence.
np-coburg.de.105627.11: The Greens and the SPD gave the state government joint responsibility.
np-coburg.de.105627.12: The two opposition factions accused Prime Minister Markus Söder (CSU) and his cabinet of neglecting the control of the accommodations of seasonal workers.
np-coburg.de.105627.13: "That can take bitter revenge if such local infection incidents take hold and regional lockdowns have to be ordered," said Jürgen Mistol, the parliamentary manager of the Greens.
np-coburg.de.105627.14: The SPD sees it very similarly: "After the Corona outbreak in the Wiesenhof slaughterhouse in mid-May, we already called for a special control program for farms with harvest workers," said environmental expert Florian von Brunn.
np-coburg.de.105627.15: "From our point of view, the hygiene conditions at the workplace and the living conditions must be strictly monitored.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.1: Aidenbachstraße underground station: Dangerous dispute: 19-year-old falls into the track bed after being pushed
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.2: In a dispute between two youth groups at the Aidenbachstrasse subway station, a 19-year-old fell through a push and slipped into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.3: Obersendling - On Friday there was a dispute between two youth groups at Aidenbachstrasse underground station at around 4.15 p.m.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.4: A passer-by alerted the police, who advanced with several patrols.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.5: According to initial investigations, a man from Munich (17) pushed a 19-year-old to the ground.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.6: The young man slipped over the edge of the platform and fell into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.7: People from the group of the 17-year-old helped the fallen victim to climb off the track.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.8: There was no danger from an approaching train.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.9: According to the police, there were then again clashes between the two people.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.10: The 17-year-old initially fled the crime scene, but his personal details could be determined afterwards.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.11: Accompanied by his father, he went to police station 29.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.12: The 17-year-old is being investigated for assault.
landeszeitung.de.13223.1: Report: Seehofer is pushing for longer data retention
landeszeitung.de.13223.3: According to a media report, however, Federal Interior Minister Horst Seehofer calls for an extension of the storage period.
landeszeitung.de.13223.4: He wants to strengthen the fight against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.5: According to a media report, Federal Interior Minister Horst Seehofer (CSU) calls for extended data retention - instead of the planned ten weeks, six months.
landeszeitung.de.13223.6: As the "Bild am Sonntag" reports, Seehofer asked Justice Minister Christine Lambrecht (SPD) in a letter for a quick change in the law.
landeszeitung.de.13223.7: Seehofer therefore wants to strengthen the measures against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.8: He thinks it makes sense to "make urgently needed adjustments to the law now," the newspaper quotes from the letter.
landeszeitung.de.13223.10: A decision by the ECJ is expected.
landeszeitung.de.13223.11: But Seehofer wants the changes beforehand so that they can be applied immediately after a possible positive judgment, the report continues.
landeszeitung.de.13223.12: A spokesman for the Ministry of Justice told the newspaper that it would only be possible to meaningfully examine whether legal adjustments were necessary once the courts had decided.
landeszeitung.de.13223.13: In the fight against child abuse and child pornography, Seehofer and the interior ministers of the federal states had already spoken out in favor of data retention in June.
bild.255016.1: NBA: Strip club trouble for Clippers star Lou Williams
bild.255016.3: Lou Williams (33), professional basketball player for the Los Angeles Clippers, is said to have left the tournament quarters at Disney World in Orlando / Florida with permission for a funeral.
bild.255016.4: According to US media reports, he went to the "Magic City" strip club in Atlanta in the evening.
bild.255016.5: Williams, who is said to have admitted the visit according to ESPN information, is back in isolation and is tested daily for Covid-19.
bild.255016.6: His reason for visiting: chicken wings.
bild.255016.7: Last February, "Sweet Lou", as he is known in the NBA, already expressed his love for these wings.
bild.255016.8: The American wrote: "Magic City and Blue Flame (another strip club in Atlanta, editor's note) have the best wings in town".
bild.255016.9: NBA insider Shams Charania announced on Twitter on Sunday that the NBA Williams has ordered a ten-day quarantine.
bild.255016.10: This means that the Clippers star missed the first two official games after the test game phase.
bild.255016.11: In Disney World, the NBA wants to end the corona season.
bild.255016.12: The best 22 teams are currently preparing for the season finale, which begins on Friday night, with training matches.
np-coburg.de.105625.1: Söder comments on the corona situation after a mass infection
np-coburg.de.105625.2: Munich - Health Minister Melanie Huml (CSU) announced a test offensive for large farms on Sunday.
np-coburg.de.105625.3: The press conference can be seen live on our homepage.
np-coburg.de.105625.4: The case in Mamming in the Dingolfing-Landau district has alarmed authorities and politicians.
np-coburg.de.105625.5: Almost 500 harvest workers from several countries are currently working on the large vegetable farm, and over a third have been infected with the corona pathogen.
np-coburg.de.105625.6: The yard is now under quarantine and is cordoned off with a construction fence.
np-coburg.de.105625.7: Nobody is allowed to leave the premises, food is being delivered.
np-coburg.de.105625.8: The authorities are now offering free corona tests to the good 3,300 residents of the community.
np-coburg.de.105625.9: Since the harvest workers had little contact with the local population, the district office has so far assumed that the infections have not spread beyond the courtyard.
kurier.at.204625.1: "Remorse": Confession of the alleged arsonist of Nantes
kurier.at.204625.2: "My client has shown itself to be cooperative," said lawyer Quentin Chabert of the newspaper.
kurier.at.204625.3: The defense attorney added: "He deeply regrets the acts, the confession was a release for him".
kurier.at.204625.4: His mandate was "plagued by remorse and deeply affected by the extent of the destruction."
kurier.at.204625.5: If convicted, the man faces ten years imprisonment and a fine of 150,000 euros, according to the prosecutor.
kurier.at.204625.6: The Gothic Saint Peter and Paul Cathedral in Nantes was badly damaged in a fire on Saturday night.
kurier.at.204625.7: The fire had broken out in three widely separated places in the church.
kurier.at.204625.8: Laboratory tests confirmed the suspicion of arson.
kurier.at.204625.9: The now detained suspect was arrested a few hours after the fire.
kurier.at.204625.10: However, he was released a day later.
kurier.at.204625.11: The man works as a volunteer for the diocese of Nantes and was responsible for closing the cathedral on the eve of the fire.
kurier.at.204625.12: Since there was no trace of a violent intrusion into the church, he quickly came into focus of the investigators.
infranken.de.309597.1: Discuss the abolition of the 50 + 1 rule
infranken.de.309597.2: Former DFB President Reinhard Grindel recommended thinking about abolishing the 50 + 1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.3: "German football should at least discuss conditions and clear rules for investors before the EU Commission creates a fait accompli," said Grindel of "Bild am Sonntag".
infranken.de.309597.4: He emphasized: "For the clubs that are most likely to be dangerous for Bayern and Dortmund, the 50 + 1 rules do not work anyway: see Leipzig or Leverkusen.
infranken.de.309597.5: In this respect, one cannot avoid the debate as to whether it is not advisable to facilitate the involvement of investors for associations that want to break into this phalanx ".
infranken.de.309597.6: But he had doubts whether there was a willingness in the German Football League to allow majority holdings, which are prohibited in the Bundesliga by the 50 + 1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.7: "It remains a legal risk to draw investment fences around the Bundesliga as a business location in a single European market," said Grindel.
infranken.de.309597.8: The former DFB boss sees the danger that "the attempts to ensure a more competitive balance in the Bundesliga will ultimately only weaken the competitiveness of our top clubs at European level, but will not lead to more tension in the championship".
infranken.de.309597.9: Even an even distribution of TV money will not have a decisive effect.
infranken.de.309597.10: "FC Bayern has a turnover of 750 million euros, Borussia Dortmund of 500 million and RB Leipzig of 300 million.
infranken.de.309597.11: The differences between the first three clubs alone are immense.
infranken.de.309597.12: The other 15 clubs have an average budget of 130 million, "said the 58-year-old.
infranken.de.309597.13: Looking at the past, Grindel feels betrayed.
infranken.de.309597.14: "Unfortunately, there have been people who have noticed this mistake and pierced the press instead of asking me about it," said Grindel about the acceptance of an expensive watch that led to his resignation in April 2019.
infranken.de.309597.15: "I was very concerned about that as a human being."
infranken.de.309597.16: He had received the gift worth around 11,000 euros from a Ukrainian official.
infranken.de.309597.17: "I committed a compliance violation and it was the right thing to do with it," said Grindel.
infranken.de.309597.18: "I handled the ominous watch present in a completely transparent and innocent manner.
infranken.de.309597.19: Many in the DFB knew about it ".
infranken.de.309597.20: He never "made a secret of the gift," assured the 58-year-old.
infranken.de.309597.21: "One might call that naive, in any case this form of transparency was the complete opposite of corruption".
faz.79601.1: "Black Lives Matter": injured and one dead
faz.79601.2: The protests against police violence in the United States have come to a head in several cities with Donald Trump's deployment of federal police officers.
faz.79601.3: On Saturday there were clashes between demonstrators and police officers in various cities.
faz.79601.4: Three people were injured in Louisville and 16 people arrested in Seattle.
faz.79601.5: In Austin, a person was shot dead while a march was crossing an intersection.
faz.79601.6: Previously there had been clashes again during protests against racism and police violence in Portland.
faz.79601.7: The security forces, including federal police officers, used tear gas on Saturday night and forcibly dispersed demonstrators.
faz.79601.8: Hundreds of demonstrators, some of them armed, marched through Louisville, Kentucky on Saturday, demanding that those responsible for the death of Breonna Taylor be held accountable.
faz.79601.9: The 26-year-old student was shot dead in a drug raid in her Louisville apartment in March.
faz.79601.10: The raid targeted someone who did not live there, and no drugs were found.
faz.79601.11: Three people were injured when a member of a group that describes itself as the Black American Armed Alliance fired a shot on Saturday.
faz.79601.12: According to the broadcaster NBC, they were taken to the hospital.
faz.79601.13: None of them was in mortal danger.
faz.79601.14: The police put up barricades because counter-demonstrators from a white militia had also formed.
faz.79601.15: In the end, the two groups did not meet.
faz.79601.16: In Austin, Texas, a person was shot and killed during a "Black Lives Matter" demonstration.
faz.79601.17: The police said they took a suspect into custody.
faz.79601.18: So far, she has not given any further information on the circumstances of the crime.
faz.79601.19: Mayor Steve Adler said, according to the New York Times, that he was, like many in the city, "heartbroken and stunned" about what had happened.
faz.79601.20: In the American metropolis of Seattle, protesters clashed with the police on Saturday.
faz.79601.21: They set construction trailers on fire in front of a youth prison, and the police used stun grenades and pepper spray.
faz.79601.22: According to the Seattle Times, 16 people were arrested for resisting police officers or assaulting them.
faz.79601.23: A courthouse was set on fire in the city of Oakland, California.
faz.79601.24: A small group of protesters broke windows, shot down fireworks and blinded police officers with lasers, the Oakland police said late Saturday evening (local time).
faz.79601.26: In Aurora, a suburb of Denver, Colorado, a car drove through a crowd demonstrating on a freeway.
faz.79601.27: Police said one of the protesters fired a gun and at least one person was injured and taken to hospital.
faz.79601.28: In addition, windows were broken in a courtroom and a fire was started, the police said.
infranken.de.309607.1: Rakoczy in Bad Kissingen: historical costumes defy Corona
infranken.de.309607.2: Although there was no big party in the spa town, visitors and performers enjoyed the rakoczy flair of the alternative program.
infranken.de.309607.3: It was unusual for visitors, performers and organizers: the Rakoczy weekend without the Rakoczy festival.
infranken.de.309607.4: But: Even if the big party mile in the city center was missing, the crowds and program highlights such as the hall on fire, the Rakoczy Ball or the pageant, many got their money's worth with the Corona-compliant alternative program.
infranken.de.309607.5: "I think we have succeeded in spreading Rakoczy flair," says spa director Sylvie Thormann.
infranken.de.309607.6: The guests would have accepted it well.
infranken.de.309607.7: In principle, one goes back to the beginnings of the Rakoczy festival, when the historical focus was also solely on the festival.
infranken.de.309607.9: Vesna Konhäuser and her husband have been visiting Bad Kissingen for the Rakoczy Festival for more than 25 years.
infranken.de.309607.10: So this time in the Corona year.
infranken.de.309607.11: The couple has made themselves comfortable at the Luitpold Casino, watching the historical while strolling and listening to live Cuban music at the casino restaurant.
infranken.de.309607.12: "I also find it very pleasant," says Konhäuser.
infranken.de.309607.13: You miss the crowds, who otherwise don't belong to Rakoczy.
infranken.de.309607.14: But she misses the usual program highlights, especially the Saale burns on Friday evening and the historic pageant and the final fireworks on Sunday evening.
infranken.de.309607.16: The weather would have been great this year, "she says.
infranken.de.309607.17: Rakoczy horse show is to take place again
infranken.de.309607.18: For the performers of the historical spa guests, the alternative program sometimes meant more work.
infranken.de.309607.19: For Christina Gold, for example, who takes part in the pageant in a normal year and can be seen there on the carriage of the Kurgartencafé.
infranken.de.309607.20: This year she walked around town in costume on Saturdays and Sundays.
infranken.de.309607.21: "It's more strenuous, otherwise it will be easier for us," she says.
infranken.de.309607.22: The riding club had less to do, even when individual riders were out and about in the park.
infranken.de.309607.23: "We very much hope that the equestrian quadrille can take place again next year," says chairwoman Ulrike Waldhofen.
infranken.de.309607.24: She announced that after a break of several years, a rakoczy horse show would take place again in 2021.
morgenpost.de.276358.1: 28 Corona cases at Spanish second division club Fuenlabrada
morgenpost.de.276358.2: The Spanish second division soccer club CF Fuenlabrada is slipping deeper and deeper into the crisis due to a corona outbreak.
morgenpost.de.276358.3: Since the newcomer from near Madrid flew to a game in the city of A Coruña on July 20, despite the first Corona cases, one low blow has followed the next.
morgenpost.de.276358.4: By Sunday, 28 players or team members had tested positive, one came to the hospital, the club announced.
morgenpost.de.276358.5: Fuenlabrada from the city of the same name south-west of Madrid still had the chance to reach the promotion playoffs.
morgenpost.de.276358.6: Now there is even a risk of relegation to the B group of the second division.
morgenpost.de.276358.7: The game against Deportivo La Coruña last Monday was canceled at the last moment, the public prosecutor's office is investigating a possible crime against public health, and the supreme sports authority CSD is considering the club's forced relegation.
morgenpost.de.276358.8: The players and other team members are quarantined in a hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.9: "By the sixth day of quarantine, they did not receive a fresh towel or gel," wrote the sports newspaper "AS".
morgenpost.de.276358.10: The photos show how players hung their underwear and club clothes to dry in their hotel rooms after they apparently had to wash them themselves.
morgenpost.de.276358.11: The bed linen was also not changed for five days.
morgenpost.de.276358.13: "AS" wrote that it was neither good nor sufficient.
morgenpost.de.276358.14: The club management announced, however, that they were satisfied with the hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.15: The club's lawyer, Javier Tebas Llanas, dismissed allegations of deliberately endangering public health.
morgenpost.de.276358.16: The son of the president of the Spanish Primera Division, Javier Tebas, emphasized that the Europa Press news agency and the sports newspaper "Marca" reported that the corona rules set up by the football association were not violated.
morgenpost.de.276358.17: Before departure, there were four infected people up to July 19, but they were all isolated and did not travel.
morgenpost.de.276358.18: Immediately before the flight to A Coruña on Monday, all players and team members were tested again.
morgenpost.de.276358.19: When the team was already in A Coruña, the corona test was positive for "five or six" other team members.
morgenpost.de.276358.20: The game was canceled 60 minutes before kick-off, said Tebas Llanas.
mainpost.de.409271.1: Police have to catch runaway horses at Dampfach
mainpost.de.409271.2: Two animals were out on the road.
mainpost.de.409271.3: The police took them back to their owner.
mainpost.de.409271.4: On Sunday morning shortly before 6 a.m., a road user reported two horses running free on the feeder between the Donnersdorf / Steinsfeld confluence and the Theres motorway junction.
mainpost.de.409271.5: When the officers arrived, the horses were already back between the feeder and the village of Dampfach.
mainpost.de.409271.6: After the officers had won the trust of the horses shortly before Dampfach, they each had a rope carried in the patrol car put around them.
azonline.de.86610.1: Professional cyclist Tony Martin: career continuation imaginable
azonline.de.86610.2: Time trial specialist Tony Martin is thinking about continuing his career.
azonline.de.86610.3: Frankfurt / Main - The seven-time world time trial champion Tony Martin can certainly imagine continuing his cycling career.
azonline.de.86610.4: "I am currently setting out the framework conditions with the team, how and in what form it could continue," said the 35-year-old of the "Frankfurter Allgemeine Sonntagszeitung".
azonline.de.86610.5: Martin is currently employed by the Dutch team Jumbo-Visma and had considered ending his career after this year before the Corona break.
azonline.de.86610.6: Negotiations with his team are also about the number of days of racing, he said.
azonline.de.86610.7: Or other problems that would plague him as a family man, said Martin.
azonline.de.86610.8: He used to get up after a fall and the first thought was: "Get back on your bike quickly.
azonline.de.86610.9: Today, as the father of a little daughter, I think: what if ".
azonline.de.86610.10: The professional cyclist admitted that there are certain aspects with which he is finding it increasingly difficult.
azonline.de.86610.11: "But it was good for me to use the Corona period to see what I got about cycling and how much fun it was for me."
azonline.de.86610.12: The time trial specialist will be back in competition at the Tour de l'Ain (August 5th to 9th).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.1: Bavaria: At least four dead on Bavaria's streets at the weekend
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.2: The beautiful weather attracts bikers to the streets in many places.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.3: For at least three people, the motorcycle tour ends in death.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.4: An 18 year old pedestrian also dies.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.5: Schönthal - In accidents on Bavaria's streets, several, mostly young people died on the weekend.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.6: An 18-year-old motorcyclist was hit by a car near Schönthal (Cham district) on Saturday that came into the opposite lane.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.7: Why the car got into the opposite lane was initially unclear.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.8: In Upper Bavaria, a 22-year-old collided with a horse-drawn carriage on his machine on Saturday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.9: According to the police, he was traveling downhill near Beilngries.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.10: In a left turn he hit the carriage.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.11: His injuries were so severe that he died at the scene of the accident.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.12: Of the twelve occupants of the carriage, one man was seriously injured and one man was slightly injured, the police said.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.13: In another fatal accident, an 18-year-old died in Bad Kötzting, Upper Palatinate.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.14: He lay down on a street on Sunday night and was run over by a 42-year-old driver.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.15: According to the police, the 18-year-old wanted to sleep.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.16: The driver was no longer able to brake in time.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.17: On Saturday near Schönberg (Freyung-Grafenau district) a 57-year-old biker hit a car in a right-hand bend despite emergency braking.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.18: He died at the scene of the accident.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.19: The 57-year-old driver suffered a shock, the other three people in the car were uninjured.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.20: The safety of motorcyclists was discussed on Saturday by Bavaria's Transport Minister Kerstin Schreyer (CSU).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.21: In a letter to the organizer of the biker protests against driving bans announced for August, Gabor Kovacs, the minister referred to extensive investments such as underrun protection on crash barriers and the defusing of dangerous bends.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.22: "We have achieved a lot for the safety of motorcyclists in recent years," said the letter.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.23: "The number of motorized two-wheelers killed fell by around 28 percent compared to 2011".
freiepresse.de.254098.1: Kovac tests with Monaco against Frankfurt
freiepresse.de.254098.2: Frankfurt / Main (dpa) - For soccer coach Niko Kovac there will soon be a reunion with Eintracht Frankfurt with his new club AS Monaco.
freiepresse.de.254098.3: The eight-time French champion will make a guest appearance on August 1 (6:00 p.m.) at the Hessians, the Croatian’s former club.
freiepresse.de.254098.4: For the Bundesliga club, it is the first and only endurance test before the second leg in the Europa League against FC Basel (August 6).
freiepresse.de.254098.5: Due to the coronavirus pandemic, the encounter will be held without a spectator.
freiepresse.de.254098.6: "We're particularly looking forward to this game.
freiepresse.de.254098.7: It's always nice to come to Frankfurt and meet friends, "explained Kovac.
freiepresse.de.254098.8: The 48-year-old said it was an interesting test from a sporting point of view.
freiepresse.de.254098.9: Before moving to FC Bayern Munich, Kovac had coached the Hessians from 2016 to 2018 and led them to victory in the DFB Cup.
freiepresse.de.254098.10: "A top-class opponent like Monaco is a good test for us with regard to the game against Basel.
freiepresse.de.254098.11: Like everyone in Frankfurt, I'm looking forward to seeing Niko Kovac again, "said Eintracht coach Adi Hütter.
freiepresse.de.254098.12: The 50-year-old Austrian had succeeded the Croatian at Eintracht.
freiepresse.de.254098.13: In March, the Frankfurt team lost the first leg of the last 16 against Basel in their own stadium 3-0.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.1: Almost 50 new infections: Hof district just past the lockdown
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.2: In the district of Hof, the number of known new corona infections increased further on the weekend: from 39 on Friday and 43 on Saturday (one person has recovered and is no longer included in these statistics) to 47 on Sunday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.3: There is also a case in the city of Hof.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.4: The Hof area is thus approaching the critical mark of 50 new infections per 100,000 inhabitants in one week.
euronews-de.199228.1: 700 deaths from monsoon rains in Southeast Asia
euronews-de.199228.2: More than 9 million people are affected by the severe floods in Southeast Asia, mainly in Bangladesh, India and Nepal.
euronews-de.199228.3: Because of the heavy monsoon rain, a total of 700 people were killed.
euronews-de.199228.4: In Bangladesh, the Red Crescent is trying to reach the isolated people in boats.
euronews-de.199228.6: The farmers have lost their crops.
euronews-de.199228.7: Indian rhinos in national park die from landslides
euronews-de.199228.8: Several of the 120 Indian rhinos died from landslides in Kaziranga National Park.
euronews-de.199228.9: They are under protection and are considered endangered.
euronews-de.199228.10: This year the floods are particularly bad, which scientists attribute to climate change.
euronews-de.199228.11: According to the United Nations, Bangladesh is one of the countries hardest hit by global warming.
euronews-de.199228.13: In the town of Cox's Bazar in southern Bangladesh, the state has built apartments for 650 people displaced by the floods.
euronews-de.199228.14: So far only a few have moved in.
euronews-de.199228.15: It's difficult to get people to Cox's Bazar.
euronews-de.199228.16: The enthusiasm also remains within limits.
euronews-de.199228.17: Anyone who used to have a house, no matter how small it was and resembled a hut, often does not want to live in a large apartment block.
euronews-de.199228.18: Many apartments are vacant, but - the government wants - to be occupied soon by those who have lost their homes to the floods.

handelsblatt.com.292809.2: The Ministry of Economics in Buenos Aires announced on Saturday that the new requirements could not be met.
handelsblatt.com.292809.3: "That would not only be irresponsible, but also unjust," it said in a statement.
handelsblatt.com.292809.4: "While 50 percent of the children in Argentina live in poverty, we cannot increase the short-term profits of our creditors."
handelsblatt.com.292809.5: The debts of the second largest economy in South America are no longer sustainable under the current conditions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.6: Argentina is therefore calling on its private creditors to forego some of their claims of around 66 billion US dollars (around 59 billion euros).
handelsblatt.com.292809.7: If no agreement is reached, the country is threatened with bankruptcy again.
handelsblatt.com.292809.8: It would be the ninth payment default in Argentine history.
handelsblatt.com.292809.9: Most recently, the lenders had demanded higher interest rates on government bonds and changes to some contractual clauses.
handelsblatt.com.292809.10: The Argentine government is sticking to its last offer and is not prepared to make any further concessions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.11: Argentina is in a serious financial and economic crisis.
handelsblatt.com.292809.12: The inflation rate was recently more than 50 percent.
handelsblatt.com.292809.13: For the current year, experts anticipate a decline in economic power of around ten percent.
handelsblatt.com.292809.14: At the end of May, Argentina had failed to settle $ 503 million in interest receivable, slipping into a limited default.
pnp.de.390078.2: "It's going really well" - this is the conclusion drawn by Dr. Stefanie Kramer after her first days at the notary's office in Eggenfelden.
pnp.de.390078.3: In the end everything went very quickly: In mid-May, Dr. Stefanie Kramer found out that she will succeed Lutz Feller in the Eggenfelden notary's office.
pnp.de.390078.4: Just six weeks later, at the beginning of July, the doctor of law started work, and normal day-to-day business has long been in full swing.
pnp.de.390078.5: "I still have to arrive privately," she explains in an interview with the Rottaler Anzeiger and laughs.
pnp.de.390078.6: The short lead time was of course not enough to completely relocate the center of life from Regensburg to Eggenfelden, reports the native of Dingolfing.
pnp.de.390078.7: She and her husband, who works as a judge at the regional court in Regensburg, are currently looking for a suitable apartment or house in the city.
pnp.de.390078.8: At least her husband was able to apply for parental leave at short notice in order to be able to take care of the two daughters (3½ and 1½ years old).
pnp.de.390078.9: In order not to have to commute from Regensburg every day, she also has an overnight stay with her parents in Dingolfing, explains the 39-year-old.
pnp.de.390078.10: Growing up in the neighboring district, she has of course long been familiar with the city of Eggenfelden.
pnp.de.390078.11: During visits on site with her family over the past few months, she said again: "Eggenfelden is a really beautiful small town".
pnp.de.390078.12: She was all the more pleased that she won the competition for the vacancy in the selection process.
pnp.de.390078.13: Also in Dr. Stefanie Kramer's professional career plays a central role in her home town of Lower Bavaria: after studying law in Passau, she completed her legal clerkship and the 2nd state examination in Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.14: After several positions as a notary assessor, including in Rehau and Hof in Upper Franconia, Babenhausen in Unterallgäu and Regensburg - during this time she also shouldered her doctorate in labor law "on the side" - she started her first position as a notary in Rotthalmünster in the Passau district in 2012 at.
pnp.de.390078.15: In 2016 she took parental leave and finally moved to Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.16: Since then she has taken on representation services in various notary offices.
pnp.de.390078.17: When the position in Eggenfelden was advertised due to the approaching retirement of Lutz Feller, she saw the right time for a full return to work, explains the 39-year-old.
pnp.de.390078.18: The team of her predecessor, who will take over the vacation replacement in the notary's office in the future, has Dr. Stefanie Kramer has taken over completely - and has ready praise for the team at the law firm: "It's going really well!"
pnp.de.390078.19: The fact that she can rely on well-rehearsed processes makes it easier for her to take care of the upcoming relocation of the private center of life.
pnp.de.390078.20: She has already contacted a local institution about kindergarten or daycare places.
pnp.de.390078.21: And if everything goes as planned, she hopes to be able to pursue her hobby here soon - and get to know the most beautiful jogging routes in the Rottal.
an-online.de.487062.1: BVB plans to start the league with a maximum of 15,000 spectators
an-online.de.487062.2: Dortmund The largest German football stadium in Dortmund will not even be 20 percent full at the start of the season if fans return.
an-online.de.487062.3: "Due to the distance regulation, which must be strictly observed, we are currently planning with 12,000 to 15,000 spectators," said Borussia Dortmund's managing director Carsten Cramer the "Tagesspiegel".
an-online.de.487062.4: Normally, the arena in the Revierstadt holds a little more than 81,000 spectators for Bundesliga games.
an-online.de.487062.5: In the ghost games caused by the corona pandemic last season, BVB lost around four million euros per game.
an-online.de.487062.6: Cramer, who is responsible for marketing, digitization and internationalization at BVB, hopes that, in addition to the normal spectator seats, some of the approximately 4,000 seats in the hospitality area can be opened again: "Of course, it is a blow to the office if this income breaks down completely".
an-online.de.487062.7: In view of the ongoing Corona crisis, everyone is currently "well advised to take a stable page first".
an-online.de.487062.8: "If many companies are not doing well and 6.8 million people in Germany alone are on short-time work, then the need for entertainment is limited," explained Cramer.
an-online.de.487062.9: The Dortmund marketing boss praised the BVB professionals for their partial salary waiver, which should help to overcome the crisis: "Of course, the players know that their salary waiver has a different effect than if we 100 people who work in merchandising, on Set short-time work ".
kurier.at.204565.1: Tiny miracles: an early start in life with a few hundred grams
kurier.at.204565.2: Hardly heavier than a packet of butter, just three tablespoons of blood in his entire body: That was Gabriel when he was born - he weighed exactly 273 grams.
kurier.at.204565.3: The boy is one of around 400 premature babies who are cared for every year at the Graz Children's Clinic.
kurier.at.204565.4: A quarter of them weigh less than 1,500 grams, a few - like Gabriel and his brothers Raphael and Michael - are extremely lightweights with a birth weight of less than one kilogram.
kurier.at.204565.5: They are so small and born so prematurely that neither the lungs, nor the intestines, nor the muscles are fully developed.
kurier.at.204565.6: Your skin is sometimes so tender that it could damage the electrodes on an EKG.
kurier.at.204565.7: And they are so tiny that they sometimes wear doll clothes and mini diapers made especially for them.
kurier.at.204565.8: But not so small that they are out of tune - "and how", grins Berndt Urlesberger.
kurier.at.204565.9: "Even if they don't scream as loudly as big babies, of course."
schwaebische-post.de.62177.1: When the whiteboard becomes a stage
schwaebische-post.de.62177.2: Despite Corona theater in the classroom: The 9th grade of the Sankt-Jakobus-Gymnasium in Abtsgmünd experienced the whiteboard as a stage shortly before the start of the holiday.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.3: Actress Julia Sylvester from the theater of the city of Aalen presented the production "Das Heimatkleid" to the students - via video.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.4: Afterwards, the students were able to talk to the actress and director Winfried Tobias about the play and the performance via Skype.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.5: The idea for the performance format was born from the current Corona situation.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.6: Teacher Teresa Nar was delighted with the enrichment of the class.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.7: Even if in the end everyone involved agreed that direct encounters in the theater and stage would offer additional stimuli, the theater also shows the potential for contact with schools.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.8: "If we continue to improve the technical framework, it could be an interesting addition to gaming operations," emphasized director Winfried Tobias.

mz-web.de.376296.1: "Gone with the Wind": Film legend Olivia de Havilland is dead
mz-web.de.376296.2: Film legend and Oscar winner Olivia de Havilland is dead.
mz-web.de.376296.3: Her spokeswoman for the German Press Agency confirmed that she died of natural causes in Paris on Sunday at the age of 104.
mz-web.de.376296.4: De Havilland was known for her role as Melanie Hamilton in the southern epic "Gone with the Wind" (1939).
mz-web.de.376296.5: Born in Tokyo to British parents, Olivia de Havilland moved to California as a toddler.
mz-web.de.376296.6: The Austrian theater man Max Reinhardt discovered the 19-year-old in the role of Hermia in Shakespeare's "Midsummer Night's Dream".
mz-web.de.376296.7: The film studio Warner Brothers signed her for seven years and made her big on the side of Eroll Flynn.
mz-web.de.376296.8: She made eight films with the heartbreaker.
mz-web.de.376296.9: In 1946 she won her first Oscar for the lead role of "To Each His Own".
mz-web.de.376296.10: The film ran in Germany under the title "Mutterherz".
mz-web.de.376296.11: Three years later came the award for best actress in William Wyler's "The Heiress".
mz-web.de.376296.12: She was also widely recognized as a neurotic eccentric in "The Dark Mirror" and "The Snake Pit".
mz-web.de.376296.13: Daphne du Maurier proposed her in 1952 for the lead role in the film adaptation of her novel "My Cousin Rachel".
mz-web.de.376296.14: The piece became a worldwide success.
mz-web.de.376296.15: She played in "Lullaby for a Corpse" with her long-time friend Bette Davis.
mz-web.de.376296.16: The son Benjamin emerged from his marriage to the writer Marcus Goodrich (1946 to 1953).
mz-web.de.376296.17: In Paris, de Havilland married the journalist Pierre Paul Galante and had the daughter Gisèle with him.
mz-web.de.376296.19: Rumors of an affair with former British Prime Minister Edward Heath have never been confirmed.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.1: "Road to Timmendorf": Beach volleyball: Thole / Wickler miss the final on comeback
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.2: The World Cup runners-up Julius Thole and Clemens Wickler missed the finals at the beach volleyball tournament "Road to Timmendorf".
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.3: At the meeting of the top teams in Düsseldorf they were defeated in the semifinals by their national team colleagues Nils Ehlers and Lars Flüggen with 1: 2 (17:21, 21:17, 19:21).
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.4: Thole / Wickler last played at the World Tour Final in Rome in September last year.

augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.6: In addition to the show tournament, three starting places for the German championships in Timmendorfer Strand at the beginning of September were played: The tickets were secured by Armin Dollinger / Simon Kulzer, Manuel Harms / Richard Peemüller and Simon Pfretschner / Milan Sievers.
paz-online.de.95211.1: Kalbitz expulsion from AfD confirmed - FDP speaks of "fig leaf"
paz-online.de.95211.2: The exclusion of Andreas Kalbitz from the AfD is, from the FDP's point of view, only a "fig leaf" and does not change the character of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.3: "The AfD is the parliamentary arm of the right-wing extremists in Germany.
paz-online.de.95211.4: Andreas Kalbitz is only part of the tip of the radical iceberg in the AfD, "said FDP domestic politician Benjamin Strasser of the dpa news agency in Berlin.
paz-online.de.95211.5: The Federal Arbitration Court of the AfD had confirmed the exclusion of Kalbitz on Saturday in Stuttgart after several hours of negotiations, which the federal board had decided by a majority in May.
paz-online.de.95211.6: Kalbitz is chairman of the AfD parliamentary group in the Brandenburg state parliament.
paz-online.de.95211.7: "If the AfD really wanted to consistently remove right-wing extremists from their party, functionaries like Björn Höcke and his supporters would have long since been excluded," said Strasser.
paz-online.de.95211.8: "But there is no political will in the AfD because right-wing extremism is now part of the party."
paz-online.de.95211.9: CSU General Secretary Markus Blume expressed himself in a similar way: "The fact that Andreas Kalbitz is now excluded says nothing and does not change anything," he told the "Welt am Sonntag".
paz-online.de.95211.10: "Rather, it speaks volumes how many frenetic supporters a right-wing extremist in the middle of the AfD still has."
paz-online.de.95211.11: Blume assumes that the AfD will end up below five percent again in future elections.
paz-online.de.95211.12: "The days of the AfD in parliaments are numbered".
paz-online.de.95211.13: Kalbitz was one of the spokesmen for the officially disbanded "wing" around the Thuringian AfD state and parliamentary group leader Björn Höcke; the Office for the Protection of the Constitution classifies the denigration as "secured right-wing extremist efforts".
paz-online.de.95211.14: In May, the AfD national board had thrown Kalbitz out of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.15: The reason he gave was that when he joined the party, Kalbitz had not given a previous membership in the now banned right-wing extremist "Heimattreuen Deutschen Jugend" (HDJ) and the Republicans.
paz-online.de.95211.16: Kalbitz denies membership in the HDJ.
paz-online.de.95211.17: The chairman of the left-wing parliamentary group in the Brandenburg state parliament, Sebastian Walter, also emphasized that the decision of the federal arbitration court did not change anything in the character of the AfD: "The wolf only ate chalk.
paz-online.de.95211.18: The AfD remains a right-wing extremist party, with or without Kalbitz ".
paz-online.de.95211.19: Neither the federal party nor the right wing will be weakened by this decision.
paz-online.de.95211.20: "The maneuver of the Meuthen troop is transparent.
paz-online.de.95211.21: They want to avoid further observation by the Office for the Protection of the Constitution and try to get through under the radar, "said Walter.
paz-online.de.95211.22: "The AfD is not getting rid of the ghosts it called.
paz-online.de.95211.23: An expulsion doesn't change anything, "commented the Brandenburg SPD General Secretary Erik Stohn on the decision in the Kalbitz case.
paz-online.de.95211.24: "Here the AfD regional association and the parliamentary group up to this day stuck to their right-wing leader".
paz-online.de.95211.25: The legal dispute over Kalbitz's membership in the AfD will continue.
paz-online.de.95211.26: This announced on Saturday that he would now proceed against the decision of the Federal Arbitration Court under civil law.
paz-online.de.95234.1: North Sea wind farms deliver a good 21 percent more electricity
paz-online.de.95234.2: The wind power plants on the German North Sea fed 11.51 terawatt hours of electricity into the grid in the first six months of the year.
paz-online.de.95234.3: That is a good 21 percent more than in the same period of the previous year, announced the network operator Tennet in Bayreuth.
paz-online.de.95234.4: Tennet is responsible for the transmission of the North Sea electricity to the mainland and the transmission through the German power grid.
paz-online.de.95234.5: The wind turbines on the Baltic Sea, which are not part of the Tennet grid area, have fed in a further 2.22 terawatt hours (TWh) of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.6: Overall, wind power from the North Sea and Baltic Sea thus comes to 13.73 TWh, compared to a good 11.64 TWh in the first half of 2019.
paz-online.de.95234.7: The wind harvest at sea makes up almost 19 percent of the total wind power in Germany; that is about four percentage points more than a year ago.
paz-online.de.95234.8: New wind farms ensure higher generation capacities
paz-online.de.95234.9: The increased contribution of offshore wind energy results from the wind conditions and from higher generation capacities because new wind farms have been connected to the grid in the past twelve months.
paz-online.de.95234.10: If the 1270 wind power plants in the North Sea were all running at full power at the same time, they could theoretically generate 6.7 gigawatts of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.11: The transmission capacity is sufficient for this; According to Tennet, it is 7.1 gigawatts.
paz-online.de.95234.12: It is expected to increase to 17 gigawatts in the German North Sea by 2030.
paz-online.de.95234.13: "In Germany and the Netherlands we will invest 20 billion euros in the expansion of the offshore grid connections", said Tennet managing director Tim Meyerjürgens.
paz-online.de.95234.14: In reality, wind farms cannot fully utilize their capacity at sea either, but reach around 40 percent.
paz-online.de.95234.15: The record day so far this year is January 2, when the North Sea wind farms generated more than six gigawatts of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.16: On average, the North Sea wind turbines produce around 2.5 to 3.0 gigawatts of electricity, which corresponds to three to four nuclear power plants.
paz-online.de.95234.17: This could supply almost seven million households with electricity.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.1: Art "Skirmish" - an exhibition by the Leipzig artist Christian Bold in the gallery of the Gmünder Kunstverein.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.2: That was almost a small anniversary celebration for the 130th
schwaebische-post.de.62187.3: Birthday of the Gmünder Kunstverein: The opening of the exhibition "Skirmish" with works by the Leipzig artist Christian Bold went beyond the usual scope after the Corona break.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.4: Much more art lovers than usual followed the dialogue between the artist and the chairman of the art association, Professor Dr. Klaus Ripper.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.5: The musical equivalent was provided by the band "Defenders of the Universe" on the southern Kornhausplatz.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.6: The association "Sandtogether" got involved to the north of the gallery.
dnn-online.de.39567.1: Freital: Windbergfest canceled due to Corona
dnn-online.de.39567.2: The Windbergfest does not take place this year.
dnn-online.de.39567.3: The city of Freital has canceled the three-day festival planned for September.
dnn-online.de.39567.4: In other years, over 30,000 people had attended this city festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.5: "We really did not make this decision easy for ourselves and - knowing how difficult it is economically for those involved - we hoped until the last minute," said Mayor Uwe Rumberg (non-party).
dnn-online.de.39567.6: "But in the end we as the organizer are responsible for the health of many thousands of people".
dnn-online.de.39567.7: Because if tens of thousands had poured into the festival area and the marquee, minimum distances, hygiene regulations and contact tracking in accordance with the current corona protection ordinance would not have been able to be observed.
dnn-online.de.39567.8: Or the restrictions would have been so severe that not much would have been left of a folk festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.9: In addition, the organizational and monitoring effort would increase disproportionately many times over.
dnn-online.de.39567.10: Rumberg put off until next year.
dnn-online.de.39567.11: Then the city of Freital will celebrate its 100th anniversary with the Winterbergfest from May 7th to 9th, 2021 and the Saxon Day from September 10th to 12th, 2021
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.1: You can't beat the Olympic dressage champion Werth in Achleiten
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.2: Achleiten - The six-time Olympic champion Isabell Werth was the outstanding rider at the dressage tournament in Achleiten, Austria.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.3: The 51-year-old from Rheinberg had four wins in four starts at the weekend.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.4: After winning a Grand Prix each with Weihegold and Quantaz at the start, she was unbeatable on Sunday in the Grand Prix Special and in the Freestyle.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.5: On the 15-year-old mare Weihegold, Werth clearly beat the Austrian Victoria Max-Theurer on Abegglen in the special on Sunday.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.6: In the freestyle on Saturday, the German was clearly ahead of her 34-year-old student Victoria Max-Theurer on Quantaz.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.7: Werth's winning horse, Quantaz, belongs to Max-Theurer.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.8: The most successful dressage rider in the world should establish the ten-year-old stallion in the Grand Prix.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.9: For Quantaz it was the first freestyle ever.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.10: At the first tournament in Achleiten three weeks ago, Werth had already won all four important tests.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.11: The last of the three international tournaments is planned there for August 14th to 16th.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.1: More air traffic controllers in Worms in future
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.2: The University of Applied Sciences in Worms continues to take off: The "DFS Deutsche Flugsicherung" is donating a professorship for "Air Traffic Management".
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.3: A corresponding contract between the university and DFS has now been signed in Worms.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.4: The contract was initially concluded for three years and will start in 2021.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.5: The professorship gives you the opportunity to start your studies not only in the summer but also in the winter semester.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.6: This means that twice as many students can be trained as before.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.7: At the same time, the capacities at both the university and the DFS air traffic control academy are being used evenly.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.8: The DFS will advise the university on establishing and filling the professorship.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.10: Since the summer semester of 2019, the first students have been studying air traffic management at the University of Worms as part of their training to become air traffic controllers.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.11: Nine students have already started this year.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.12: So far, the experiences at DFS have been very positive, the performance of the students is excellent.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.13: The combination of studies and pilot training makes a significant contribution to further increasing the attractiveness of the pilot profession.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.14: "In these times, funding is not easy for us economically.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.15: However, we firmly anticipate that air traffic will recover and grow again in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.16: In order to be able to continue to fulfill our legal mandate in the future, we need highly qualified staff, "says Professor Klaus-Dieter Scheurle, Chairman of the DFS Managing Director when signing the contract.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.17: "For DFS, the endowed professorship is a future-proof investment that will provide air traffic controllers with a broad, interdisciplinary knowledge base in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.18: We are therefore continuing our good cooperation with the university and at the same time reinforcing our attractiveness as an employer ".
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.19: This is also underlined by Professor Dr. Jens Hermsdorf, President of the University of Worms: "The endowed professorship forms an important bridge between science and business.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.20: With her, we would like to build on the already existing cooperation with DFS Deutsche Flugsicherung as a practical partner for the dual bachelor's degree in Air Traffic Management ".
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.21: The trust of the German air traffic control system is both a motivation and an obligation for the University of Worms to further develop its teaching and research skills in the future fields of air traffic.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.22: With the first endowed professorship for a dual course of study, the university can set very special highlights and innovative focal points for its students when working for the air traffic controllers of tomorrow.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.23: Dr. Denis Alt, State Secretary in the Ministry of Science, Further Education and Culture, emphasizes: "The University of Worms, with its focus on air traffic, has a unique selling point in Rhineland-Palatinate.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.24: Today's signing of the cooperation agreement strengthens the profile of the university ".
main-netz.de.61826.1: Rescue helicopter lands on the A 45
main-netz.de.61826.2: The A 45 motorway in the direction of Aschaffenburg was completely closed for around 30 minutes on Saturday afternoon, as the rescue helicopter was in action after a traffic accident.
main-netz.de.61826.3: A 76-year-old drove in a Ford at about 12.40 p.m. at the Alzenau-Mitte exit straight ahead in the curve and landed on the guardrail.
main-netz.de.61826.4: The front airbags were triggered by the impact, the driver suffered minor injuries to the face and had to be taken to a hospital for treatment.
main-netz.de.61826.5: The injuries of the 72-year-old passenger were treated by the emergency doctor and the patient was then flown to a hospital by rescue helicopter.
main-netz.de.61826.6: However, the police are currently assuming that there is no danger to life.
main-netz.de.61826.7: The damaged vehicle, which was damaged by around 2000 euros, had to be towed away.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.1: After the meat industry, Heil wants to examine other industries
mittelbayerische.de.307327.2: The Corona crisis brought the conditions in parts of the meat industry to light again.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.4: But are they legal - and will it stay that way?
mittelbayerische.de.307327.5: Federal Labor Minister Hubertus Heil (SPD) wants to review other industries according to the strict regulations now planned against abuses in the meat industry.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.6: "We will look at each branch and then take appropriate measures for the respective branch if necessary," said Heil to the German press agency in Berlin.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.7: Germany's employers are already warning against generally restricting work contracts.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.8: After the massive corona outbreak at the meat giant Tönnies in North Rhine-Westphalia, the federal cabinet wants to pass a law of salvation this Wednesday.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.9: Large slaughterhouses should no longer be allowed to use external personnel for slaughtering, cutting and meat processing.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.10: For this purpose, the use of contract workers and temporary workers is to be prohibited there.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.11: Employer President Ingo Kramer told the dpa: "Stay away from a general restriction of work contracts and temporary employment, if you do not want to completely stall the economy".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.12: Contracts for work and services are, for example, the basis for creating value for customers in large areas of the trades, the construction industry and plant engineering.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.13: "The misconduct of individuals cannot destroy such an important instrument".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.14: Heil assured: "My goal is not to ban contracts for work and services everywhere in the German economy".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.16: "If an industrial company hires a craftsman to install a security system, it is a completely normal work contract".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.17: The German meat industry considers a ban on work contracts and temporary work to be unconstitutional in its sector alone.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.18: It cannot be explained why different labor laws should apply to portioning and packaging of cheese than to sausage, according to a statement on the proposed law, as reported by the "Neue Osnabrücker Zeitung" (Saturday).
mittelbayerische.de.307327.19: In the event of a ban, the consumer price would rise by 10 to 20 percent per kilo and product.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.20: According to the results of an audit by the NRW occupational health and safety administration, many Eastern European employees from contract companies worked 16 hours a day in the industry.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.21: Often they did not have a break.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.22: Wages were withheld for protective equipment or rent.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.23: It was also found that the housing situation for employees was often miserable.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.24: Heil said that a relatively strict law came into force for the meat industry as early as 2017.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.25: However, these were bypassed by "tricky constructions".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.26: "Now we have to clean up fundamentally".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.27: The politician announced: "In the labor protection law, which we want to pass in the cabinet at the end of July, there are also measures that not only affect the meat industry - for example higher inspection rates for occupational health and safety or clear criteria for shared accommodation".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.28: The draft presented to the dpa includes changes to the law on safeguarding workers' rights in the meat industry and the law on occupational health and safety.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.29: Brandenburg's consumer protection minister Ursula Nonnemacher (Greens) considers more intensive controls to be necessary.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.30: "I would like to see that we can do even more controls in many areas of supervision: food controls, animal welfare, all sorts of things, including animal transport," said Nonnemacher on Sunday in the RBB program "Brandenburg aktuell".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.31: But more staff positions are needed for more controls.
