rundschau-online.de.151934.1: Clearance of Frankfurter Opernplatz proceeded peacefully
rundschau-online.de.151934.2: A week after the riots in Frankfurt, the evacuation of the Opernplatz on Sunday night was peaceful.
rundschau-online.de.151934.3: Most recently, a few dozen people were still in the square, but left before curfew at 1 a.m.
rundschau-online.de.151934.4: The police had been on duty with numerous officers since the early evening, and a large number of police could be seen throughout the city.
rundschau-online.de.151934.5: For the first time this weekend from midnight there was a ban on entering the Opernplatz, where there had been riots a week ago.
rundschau-online.de.151934.6: Police officers were attacked with bottles from among the crowd.
rundschau-online.de.151934.7: At least five officers were injured according to police reports and several police vehicles were damaged.
rundschau-online.de.151934.8: The Saturday night had also remained quiet.
hna.de.247362.1: Car overturns: Young woman seriously injured in accident on federal highway 83 near Hofgeismar
hna.de.247362.2: In an accident between Schöneberg and Hümme, a 21-year-old suffered serious injuries on Sunday around 1:25 p.m.
hna.de.247362.3: She was brought to the Kassel Clinic.
hna.de.247362.4: The fire brigade looked for possible passengers with thermal imaging cameras.
hna.de.247362.5: According to the police, the woman was on the federal road 83 in the direction of her home town of Hümme when her car came off the road for an unexplained cause and rolled over several times.
hna.de.247362.6: In order to save the victim, the fire brigade had to cut open the roof of the car.
hna.de.247362.7: Since it was unclear whether someone was still in the vehicle, the adjacent corn field was searched from the turntable ladder with a thermal imaging camera.
hna.de.247362.8: The drone squadron from Warburg, which also works with thermal imaging cameras, was ordered to search for people.
hna.de.247362.9: However, the emergency services did not find anyone among the tall maize plants.
hna.de.247362.10: The seriously injured was taken to the Kassel Clinic for further treatment by ambulance.
hna.de.247362.11: Almost 50 emergency services from the Hofgeismar, Hümme and Schöneberg fire brigade were on site.
hna.de.247362.12: The federal highway was closed for two hours because of the accident.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.2: Turin - After a redeeming goal from Cristiano Ronaldo, record champions Juventus Turin have secured the Italian championship for the ninth time in a row.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.3: The team around the five-time world footballer made the 36th Scudetto in the club's history with a 2-0 (1-0) on Sunday evening in the home game against Sampdoria Genoa.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.5: With 83 points, Turin, which started without the ex-international Sami Khedira, who was recently injured for a long time, can no longer be displaced from first place two game days before the end of the Serie A season.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.6: The table runner-up Inter Milan is seven points behind.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.7: Juventus was harmless despite their visual superiority in the first half, then Ronaldo scored after a free kick variant with the last action.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.8: The 35-year-old used a pass from Miralem Pjanic from the edge of the penalty area with a low shot (45th + 7th).
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.9: Against the more offensive guests, Ronaldo was also involved in the 2-0, after his shot Federico Bernardeschi dusted off (67th).
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.10: This ensured the lackluster but decisive success.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.11: The foul penalty missed on the crossbar in the 89th minute should only have been corrected by Ronaldo himself with a view to the scorer rating.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.12: "It's difficult to stay level with the ball for 90 minutes, mentally and physically.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.13: The games are strange and the momentum changes very easily, "said coach Maurizio Sarri after the 2-1 draw at Udinese Calcio on Thursday.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.14: Above all, the mental exhaustion of his players is great, said the Juve coach.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.15: Because of the defeat, the Turin team had not yet been able to make the championship perfect.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.16: In the end, Juve owed its lead at the top of the table, mainly to the weakness of its competitors.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.17: Because in the eleven games before the game on Sunday, the Sarri team had only managed five wins.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.18: It is questionable whether Ronaldo will also be the top scorer.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.19: Because while the Portuguese superstar has scored 31 goals so far, the former Dortmund Ciro Immobile has 34 goals on his account after his three-pack in the 5-1 (1-1) of fourth in the table Lazio Rome at Hellas Verona - as many as Robert Lewandowski to win the title of FC Bayern contributed.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.20: The current Juve professional Gonzalo Higuaín holds the record in Italy.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.21: The Argentine scored 36 goals for SSC Napoli in the 2015/2016 season.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.22: In August, the "old lady" of Italian football has the next chance to win the title.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.23: Juventus are in the last sixteen of the Champions League, but have to make up for a 0-1 first leg defeat against Olympique Lyon on August 7 to reach the final tournament in Lisbon.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.24: In the next knockout round, Real Madrid or Manchester City would wait as opponents.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.1: Baden-Württemberg: Over 250 illegal car races recorded
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.2: Stuttgart - Despite all the threatened fines and court rulings, drivers continue to give gas in countless illegal races on the streets of Baden-Württemberg: In the past year and the first four months of this year, the police in the southwest have already registered more than 250 illegal car races.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.3: There are no comparative values for the years before, but the speeders are making the judicial authorities more and more work: A total of 155 investigations into illegal races were conducted in the public prosecutor's offices between Konstanz and Mannheim in 2018, one year later there were already 252 and this year up to At the beginning of June already 151.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.4: The races were less about organized events, as can be seen from the answer from the Interior Ministry to a request from the SPD in the state parliament.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.5: In most cases, the drivers spontaneously competed against each other or they fled from the police - this is also reported as an illegal race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.6: Mainly German men between the ages of 18 and 60 sat at the wheel.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.8: Only in comparatively few cases are the speeders caught and asked to pay: According to the Ministry of the Interior, a total of 113 fines and 15 prison sentences have been imposed since 2018.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.9: But there is no evidence that the number of illegal car races is actually increasing.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.10: Rather, other drivers reacted more sensitively than before because of the number of tragic accidents and processes in the past and reported more often, said a ministry spokesman.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.11: The Autobahn 8 is particularly popular with racers. Drivers there slow down the traffic again and again in order to make room and use the free track for a race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.12: Last August, a dozen drivers were caught near Kirchheim unter Teck, three months earlier there were even 18 drivers on the A8 near Merklingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.14: The police even register more races on the A81 than on any other federal motorway.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.15: With a speed limit, attempts are made there to slow down the speeders on the particularly affected section between Engen and Geisingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.16: The mostly high-priced and souped-up sports and luxury cars often have Swiss license plates, because the drivers move to Germany because of the high penalties for driving too fast and car racing in the neighboring country.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.17: For the SPD, the speed limit must not be reduced to a few routes: "With a general speed limit of 130 kilometers per hour, we would get rid of this problem on motorways," says Martin Rivoir, the traffic expert for the SPD parliamentary group.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.18: "The inhibition threshold for speeders would be significantly higher if you weren't allowed to legally travel at 200 kilometers per hour and more here and there."
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.19: Rivoir thinks less of education or image campaigns: "Anyone who disregards all the rules in such a way and not only jeopardizes their own lives but also the lives of other road users can hardly be reached with common sense."
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.20: ADAC calls for stronger action from the police
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.21: For the ADAC, however, this is not enough: "We are assuming that the speed limits will not scare them off," says Holger Bach, Head of the Traffic and Environment Department at ADAC Württemberg.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.22: He calls for additional and tougher controls on the affected routes.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.23: The high-speed test of strength often turns into painful and serious seriousness: Since January 2019 and until April 2020, three people have died in the races across the country, two bystanders in a nightly crash in downtown Stuttgart and one in Gerlingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.24: Two young men are said to have delivered a car race there in November.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.25: One of the vehicles came off the road, hit a garden wall and lay on its side, the 18-year-old passenger died.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.26: 21 other people were injured in races over the past two years.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.27: In the opinion of Interior Minister Thomas Strobl, however, stricter penalties are not necessary.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.1: Blue light from July 23rd: thirsty burglar steals drinks from snack bar
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.2: Rohrdorf: A man broke into a snack bar in Rohrdorf (Calw district) on Thursday and stole drinks and cash.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.3: A witness heard noises in Talstrasse around 3:40 a.m. and ran in the direction of the snack bar.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.4: There he noticed a man who was helping himself with drinks at the refrigerator and then leaving the snack bar through a previously smashed front door.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.5: The perpetrator fled in the direction of the meadows behind the snack bar.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.6: According to the police, the burglar also used a cash register and stole low three-digit cash.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.7: The suspect is described as follows: He is about 1.75 to 1.80 meters tall and of strong stature.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.8: In fact, he wore a black hoodie, black pants, and light-colored shoes.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.9: The police will receive further evidence from witnesses.
pnp.de.390142.1: Ackermann sprints to victory on the final stage of the Sibiu Tour
pnp.de.390142.2: Professional cyclist Pascal Ackermann won his second day's victory on the final stage of the 10th Sibiu Tour.
pnp.de.390142.3: The 26-year-old from the Bora-hansgrohe team from Palatinate prevailed in the mass sprint on the 109-kilometer section with start and finish in Sibiu, having won a stage on Saturday.
pnp.de.390142.4: It was the season three and four wins for Ackermann.
pnp.de.390142.5: In the overall ranking, his Austrian team mate Gregor Mühlberger prevailed.
pnp.de.390142.6: The 26-year-old had won the mountain time trial in the morning and thus took the lead in the standings.
pnp.de.390142.7: Only 104 drivers started the final stage in the evening.
pnp.de.390142.8: No fewer than 18 starters fell victim to the time limit in the mountain time trial.
pnp.de.390142.9: "I'm really happy to start the new season with a win," said Ackermann after his success on Saturday.
pnp.de.390142.10: "The sprint was really hectic," said the 26-year-old.
pnp.de.390142.11: 300 meters from the finish, he simply put on his sprint, "and it worked perfectly".
pnp.de.390142.12: In accordance with the rules of the UCI, a corona test was carried out on all race participants and their companions six days before the start of the race.
pnp.de.390142.13: During the entire tour, the driver and supervisor were separated from the organization team and the media in isolated hygiene bubbles.
pnp.de.390142.14: Spectators at the start and finish were not allowed.
bild.254818.1: Control center gave instructions for lay resuscitation
bild.254818.2: Düsseldorf - tragic accident on Sunday afternoon in Düsseldorf-Garath.
bild.254818.3: In an apartment building, a child (4) suddenly lay lifeless in the water while bathing.
bild.254818.4: According to the fire brigade, the emergency call was received shortly before 1 p.m.
bild.254818.5: "A control center dispatcher immediately gave instructions on lay resuscitation," a fire department spokesman told BILD.
bild.254818.6: The arriving rescue workers took over the resuscitation measures a little later.
bild.254818.7: The child, who was in mortal danger, was transported to the university clinic under resuscitation.
bild.254818.9: The police have routinely started investigations into the course of the accident.
bild.254818.10: The fire department spokesman: "We are assuming a tragic accident in the apartment".
infranken.de.309656.1: Nuremberg: unauthorized tuning meeting - police intervene, 700 vehicles and around 1100 people
infranken.de.309656.2: Hundreds of cars and at times over 1000 people took part in a "tuning meeting" on Saturday night in the parking lot of a furniture store.
infranken.de.309656.3: The police implemented their announcement to intensify control of such events.
infranken.de.309656.4: A big tuning meeting took place on Saturday evening (July 25, 2020) in Nuremberg's Südstadt.
infranken.de.309656.6: According to the Middle Franconia police, the Nuremberg traffic police discovered an increased number of vehicles in the area of a large car park in Ingolstädter Strasse at around 10.30 p.m.
infranken.de.309656.7: The police then carried out a large number of vehicle checks there.
infranken.de.309656.8: Only recently had the police announced that they would take action against so-called car victims.
infranken.de.309656.9: Illegal tuning meeting in Nuremberg: Only a small part of the "scene"
infranken.de.309656.10: The officers counted a good 700 vehicles and around 1100 people at the top, the police said.
infranken.de.309656.11: Of this, however, only a small part of those present can be assigned to the "autoposer" and tuning scene.
infranken.de.309656.12: Apparently, the majority of the relevant scene followed the police appeal.
infranken.de.309656.13: Based on the vehicles and people on site, it can be assumed that these were mostly onlookers.
infranken.de.309656.14: In addition, the majority of those present adhered to the applicable infection protection regulations, in particular compliance with the minimum distance and wearing mouth and nose protection.
infranken.de.309656.15: The control measures carried out on site ended around 1:00 a.m.
infranken.de.309656.16: In total, the officials found such structural changes in 10 vehicles that the operating permit had expired.
infranken.de.309656.17: Four of these vehicles had to be secured.
infranken.de.309656.19: There were no illegal car races.
infranken.de.309656.20: "The police headquarters in Middle Franconia will continue to keep an eye on what is happening and continue to carry out increased control measures, also in connection with the arrival of onlookers," it said.
infranken.de.309656.21: The News5 agency spoke to Jürgen Schrödinger from the towing company involved: "They all have beautiful rims, we mustn't scratch them," says Schrödinger.
infranken.de.309656.22: Special tapes would be used for this.
infranken.de.309656.23: Also because the cars are wider, the company must be careful not to damage them.
infranken.de.309656.24: "After all, the young people should get their cars back undamaged".
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.1: Employment agency figures: 900 suspected cases of abuse during short-time work
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.2: Berlin - According to its own statement, the Federal Employment Agency is investigating around 900 suspected cases of abuse of short-time allowance.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.3: "With more than 880,000 companies that have reported short-time work, that is extremely little," said Daniel Terzenbach, the board member responsible for operational business, of the Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.4: When a large number of companies suddenly applied for short-time work at the beginning of the Corona crisis, the BA had to react quickly.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.5: The exam usually takes up to three weeks.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.6: "We didn't have that much time in this hot phase.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.7: We will take a closer look at the final accounts.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.8: There will certainly be a lot more to come.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.9: We are not naive and have a lot of staying power ".
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.10: References to abuse often come from the employees or trade unions concerned.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.11: In addition, the BA uses analysis software to identify patterns of abuse.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.12: According to Terzenbach, the BA is preparing for a possible wave of bankruptcies in the fall.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.13: "Will there be significantly more bankruptcies than last year?
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.14: The assessments differ, but we are preparing for the worst and are already training our employees in the employment agencies to process applications for insolvency money ".
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.15: The numbers are still inconspicuous, said Terzenbach.
pnn.de.185998.1: World Heritage in Potsdam: Party in the New Garden dissolved
pnn.de.185998.2: Potsdam - On Friday evening, around 40 young people celebrated a party in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.3: The collection was dissolved at 8.48 p.m. by the district drivers of the Prussian Palaces and Gardens Foundation (SPSG), the foundation announced on request from PNN.
pnn.de.185998.4: The young people then left the park.
pnn.de.185998.5: On Saturday evening, some young people would have played rugby in the new garden.
pnn.de.185998.6: The meadow had been cleared by district drivers, said SPSG spokesman Frank Kallensee on Sunday.
pnn.de.185998.7: There are always illegal celebrations in the parks
pnn.de.185998.8: In the foundation's parks, there are frequent gatherings in which the distance and hygiene rules Covid-19 handling regulations are not observed.
pnn.de.185998.9: At the end of June there was a celebration with around 300 people in the Babelsberg Park, a week later around 150 people celebrated in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.10: Even without the corona ordinance, the parks are closed when it gets dark.
pnn.de.185998.11: Storage in the meadows is prohibited according to the park regulations, there are only a few exceptions.
pnn.de.185998.12: The foundation has been complaining for a long time that visitors are leaving more and more rubbish and destroying protected biotopes.
pnn.de.185998.13: In the meantime, illegal park parties in Berlin have reached another dimension.
pnn.de.185998.14: In the Hasenheide in the Neukölln district, 5000 people celebrated an illegal techno party on Sunday night.
pnn.de.185998.15: The event was broken up by the police.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.1: Austria: mass tests after corona outbreak in tourist resort
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.2: Authorities have reacted to a corona outbreak in the popular Upper Austrian tourist town of St. Wolfgang with hundreds of tests.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.3: The number of confirmed cases rose to 48, as the state authorities in Linz announced.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.4: More than 100 results were still pending in the evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.5: According to this, many of the infected are young interns in tourism companies, but at least one holiday guest also tested positive.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.6: Residents, guests and tourism workers were asked to stay in their accommodations on Saturday evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.7: The curfew was set at 11 p.m.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.8: "There are cancellations and cancellations" of bookings there and there, said the head of the Wolfgangsee tourism association, Hans Wieser, of the dpa.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.9: A few guests also left early.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.10: St. Wolfgang is the most important tourist destination in Upper Austria, with more than 400,000 overnight stays last year.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.11: In a normal season around a third of the guests are German.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.12: The first infections became public on Friday.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.13: The head of the district authority, Alois Lanz, defended the behavior of the interns on Saturday, who had celebrated in several bars and could have been infected there.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.14: "We all enjoyed doing that in our youth," he told the radio station Ö1.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.15: However, two bars were closed on Friday to prevent further infections.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.16: The tourism association started an information campaign to make young employees aware of the dangers of Covid-19.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.17: From Saturday, hundreds of employees, vacationers and locals were tested.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.18: In addition, all guests who were in St. Wolfgang from July 15th were contacted.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.19: The outbreak brings back memories of the Austrian ski and party resort Ischgl in Tyrol, which was a center of the corona spread throughout Europe in the initial phase of the pandemic.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.20: In total, more than 1500 people are currently infected with the virus in Austria.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.21: The focus of new infections is Vienna and Upper Austria.
wn.de.700458.1: Premier League: Man United and Chelsea qualified for Champions League
wn.de.700458.2: London (AP) - The English soccer record champions Manchester United returns to the Champions League after a year of absence.
wn.de.700458.3: The Red Devils secured third place in the table on the last day of the Premier League with a 2-0 (0-0) win against their direct rivals Leicester City.
wn.de.700458.4: The Foxes now have to be content with the Europa League, because Chelsea still overtook them and qualified fourth for the premier class.
wn.de.700458.5: In the fight against relegation Aston Villa was allowed to cheer.
wn.de.700458.6: Manchester United took the lead with a penalty from Bruno Fernandes (71st minute).
wn.de.700458.7: After a red card for Leicester City in stoppage time, Jesse Lingard (90 + 8) scored the final score.
wn.de.700458.8: Chelsea, opponents of FC Bayern in the Champions League round of 16, won 2-0 (2-0) against Wolverhampton Wanderers thanks to Mason Mount (45th + 1) and Olivier Giroud (45th + 4).
wn.de.700458.9: "That means a lot to me," said coach Frank Lampard, who is also in the FA Cup final against Arsenal in his first season as Chelsea coach.
wn.de.700458.10: Tottenham Hotspur also benefited from Chelsea's win against Wolverhampton, who overtook Wolves with a meager 1-1 (1-0) at Crystal Palace and started sixth in the Europa League.
wn.de.700458.11: Aston Villa won the long-distance duel with Watford FC and Bournemouth AFC, but had to tremble for a long time at West Ham United for relegation.
wn.de.700458.12: The late lead from Jack Grealish (84th) equalized Andrej Jarmolenko (85th) immediately.
wn.de.700458.13: The 1: 1 (0: 0) was enough because Watford lost 2: 3 (1: 3) at Arsenal.
wn.de.700458.14: The club, which scored three coaches in the season, is relegated after five years in the first division.
wn.de.700458.15: Just like Bournemouth, which could not save itself with a 3-1 (2-1) at Everton FC.
wn.de.700458.16: In the end, one point was missing.
wn.de.700458.17: Liverpool FC, who have been English champions since the end of June, secured a club record with a 3-1 (1-1) win at Newcastle United.
wn.de.700458.18: 99 points is the highest number the Reds have ever scored in any football season.
wn.de.700458.19: Coach Jürgen Klopp and his team narrowly missed the point record in English football.
wn.de.700458.20: Manchester City holds the record with 100 points in the 2017/18 season.
wn.de.700458.21: After the Newcastle lead in the first minute, Virgil van Dijk (38th), Divock Origi (59th) and Sadio Mané (89th) turned the game for Liverpool on Sunday.
wn.de.700458.22: "It's been an extraordinary season for this wonderful club," said goal scorer van Dijk after the game. "It should spur us on to defend the title.
wn.de.700458.24: In the end, the Premier League bosses should also be satisfied.
wn.de.700458.25: Because of the coronavirus crisis, football in England was interrupted from March 13th to June 17th.
wn.de.700458.26: In the meantime, there was even discussion of prematurely abandoning the game or staging the remaining games on neutral ground.
wn.de.700458.27: In the end, however, the season could be played to the end without any special incidents - but as in Germany without spectators in the stadiums.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.1: Arrests and violence during demonstrations against Netanyahu
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.2: The protests in Israel against Prime Minister Netanyahu are becoming increasingly violent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.3: Violent clashes broke out during the night.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.4: The Israeli police used violence on Sunday night in Jerusalem against participants in a demonstration against the right-wing conservative Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.5: Police spokesman Micky Rosenfeld said twelve people were arrested for participating in riots.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.6: The police used water cannons, among other things, to break up the rally.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.7: According to media reports, around 6,000 people gathered near Netanyahu's official residence on Saturday evening.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.8: They protested against unemployment, corruption and Netanyahu's handling of the corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.9: The protesters beat drums, blew horns and called on Netanyahu to resign.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.10: There were also arrested participants in a counter-demonstration who supported Netanyahu, reported the news website "ynet".
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.11: People also demonstrated in many other places in Israel, including in front of the prime minister's private villa in the coastal city of Caesarea and in a park in Tel Aviv.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.12: A man was arrested near Tel Aviv, according to police, on suspicion of spraying pepper spray from a moving car on demonstrators on the side of the road.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.13: Another man was arrested after a knife attack on a protester in the south of the country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.14: The protester was slightly injured in the neck.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.15: There have recently been multiple demonstrations against Netanyahu in Jerusalem and Tel Aviv.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.16: The rallies accompany the corruption process against the head of government.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.17: Most recently, Netanyahu was also criticized for his handling of the corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.18: Among other things, he is held responsible for premature loosening and a lack of preparation for a second corona wave.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.19: The corona crisis hit the country's economy badly.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.20: The unemployment rate was last at more than 20 percent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.21: The number of new infections with the corona virus in Israel has recently risen to new record levels.
bild.254850.1: Accident near Ahlen (North Rhine-Westphalia) - van crashes into car - nine injured - Ruhr area - Bild.de
bild.254850.2: Ahlen - A rear-end collision claimed nine slightly injured people on the B58 near Ahlen on Saturday afternoon.
bild.254850.3: A car driver was traveling with her two children (3, 5) in the direction of Beckum.
bild.254850.4: The police: "She probably suddenly braked because she wanted to turn."
bild.254850.5: The driver of a Mercedes van driving behind her must have seen that too late.
bild.254850.6: He crashed into the back of the car.
bild.254850.7: Three occupants in the car and six in the van were slightly injured in the accident.
bild.254850.8: Several ambulances took them to a nearby hospital.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.1: North Korea seals off the border town after a suspected corona case
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.2: So far, North Korea has seen its own measures to ward off the corona virus a "shining success".
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.3: Now the country is reporting for the first time on a suspected case.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.4: Because of a first official suspected corona case in the country, North Korea has completely cordoned off a large city for fear of a catastrophe.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.5: Despite the strictest epidemiological countermeasures in the past six months, "the malicious virus may have been introduced into the country," reported the state media.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.6: The state of emergency has been imposed for the region around the border town Kaesong.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.7: The communist leadership declared the highest level of alert.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.8: If the suspected case is confirmed, it would be the first official case of infection with Sars-CoV-2 in the isolated country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.9: According to its own statements, North Korea had not yet registered a single infection and described its defense measures as a "shining success".
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.11: The symptoms of the disease were reportedly found in a "runaway" who illegally crossed the military demarcation line between South and North Korea on July 19.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.12: The person fled to South Korea three years ago and has now returned across the border.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.13: There was initially no confirmation from South Korea for the border crossing within the four-kilometer-wide and largely still mined military buffer zone.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.14: According to reports by the national news agency Yonhap, the South Korean military admitted the possibility of illegally crossing the border to North Korea as high.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.15: Investigations were carried out on some people.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.16: North Korea said it called an emergency meeting of the Politburo of the Labor Party chaired by ruler Kim Jong Un on Saturday because of the suspected case.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.17: The "dangerous situation in Kaesong could trigger a deadly and devastating catastrophe".
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.18: As a preventive measure, Kim ordered "Kaesong to be completely blocked and every district and region to be isolated from others," it said.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.19: The person concerned and all people in Kaesong who had contact with her were quarantined.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.20: The party's central military commission is supposed to investigate the "outlier case" as well as the behavior of the responsible military unit and, if necessary, impose severe punishment.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.21: It is estimated that around 300,000 people live in Kaesong.
pz-news.de.72354.1: Tension before the council meeting: City-Ost and noise protection are still up for discussion before the big summer break
pz-news.de.72354.2: "In addition to environmental issues, the committee members will also vote on the zoning plan for the major downtown development project," says the middle section of the municipal press release for the next municipal council meeting on Tuesday, July 28th at 4.30 pm in the great hall of the CongressCentrum Pforzheim.
pz-news.de.72354.3: In particular, the upgrading of the eastern city is discussed controversially until the end.
pz-news.de.72354.4: The majorities for this are tight, most recently even negative in individual committees, depending on their presence.
pz-news.de.72354.5: Project opponent Reinhard Klein criticized an appeal from the economy (construction, real estate, trade and IT) not to let the project developed out of the citizenship and then by the administration and municipal council fail after almost ten years of preparation, criticized project opponent Reinhard Klein as an "extra-parliamentary opposition", "clueless", "speculation", "denigration" and "deliberate false statements".
pz-news.de.72354.6: "Everyone thinks they know better," said Klein, who has been a member of the municipal council for a year as the only representative of the Pforzheim citizens' list.
pz-news.de.72354.7: In fact, after reading the treaties, he was in this position: "I know what I'm talking about".
pz-news.de.72354.8: The exit comes the city cheaper, the technical town hall is contrary to statements of the city administration after grants, of the existence of which Klein is convinced, to renovate for 8.5 million euros.
pz-news.de.72354.9: The city will develop very differently than the city hall and proponents from the business community are predicting.
pz-news.de.72354.10: To shape the city by his own efforts and not by an investor: That is his plan B. One day after Klein, the FDP / FW / UB / LED parliamentary group, which also rejects the project, presented an alternative concept.
pz-news.de.72354.11: It essentially also provides for the redevelopment of the Technical City Hall, keeping the Schloßberg open, renting the Ex-Thales for administrative areas and, ideally, a smaller-scale redesign of the inner city with local sponsors.
pz-news.de.72354.12: Environmental issues play a central role
pz-news.de.72354.13: In addition, environmental issues in particular will play a central role.
pz-news.de.72354.14: Among other things, the municipal council will vote on the noise action plan.
pz-news.de.72354.15: This includes various measures to protect the Pforzheim population from health-related noise pollution caused by road traffic, including many speed reductions.
pz-news.de.72354.16: In a press release, the local Verkehrsclub Deutschland welcomes the widespread introduction of Tempo 30. The politicians in the city are not innocent of the fact that this has to happen, because they have to do so by neglecting the regular bus service with reduced intervals and little commitment to cycling contributed to the massive increase in car traffic and thus noise, according to the VCD.
pz-news.de.72354.17: The municipal council also votes on the participation of the city of the energy and climate protection agency Pforzheim / Enzkreis.
pz-news.de.72354.18: Also on the agenda is joining the climate protection pact of the state of Baden-Wuerttemberg, re-setting the parental contributions in the municipal day-care centers and the application for inclusion in the smart city funding of the federal government.
pz-news.de.72354.19: Citizens are welcome, but must heed Corona protective measures.
schwaebische.de.113555.1: Tim Zimmermann starts the new season with a long delay
schwaebische.de.113555.2: Tim Zimmermann will start his debut season in the ADAC GT Masters on July 31 with a delay of almost half a year.
schwaebische.de.113555.3: Before the league of super sports cars can start regular operations, the first test drives were due.
schwaebische.de.113555.4: For Zimmermann, the main thing was to get to know his Lamborghini Huracan GT3 better.
schwaebische.de.113555.5: The Corona crisis prevented Tim Zimmermann from starting his first business trip in the new Lamborghini Huracan from Grasser Racing for a long time.
schwaebische.de.113555.6: This was now possible under special hygienic conditions.
schwaebische.de.113555.7: The 23-year-old from Langenargen did his first laps at the Lausitzring and was able to get used to his debut in a GT3 car.
schwaebische.de.113555.8: "There are a few things that are different than the Porsche from the previous season," says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.9: "With ABS, for example, you have to go into corners differently.
schwaebische.de.113555.10: But it was really a lot of fun ".
schwaebische.de.113555.11: Zimmermann also had fun with Steijn Schothorst, with whom he will share his orange sports car in the GT Masters.
schwaebische.de.113555.12: Despite his only 25 years of experience, the Dutchman is already experienced in GT racing and was able to help his new team-mate in many things.
schwaebische.de.113555.13: "I'm not a beginner in motorsport, but every new series brings new challenges with it," says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.14: "Steijn and I get along great and we made enormous progress at the Lausitzring from session to session".
schwaebische.de.113555.15: It is precisely there - at the Lausitzring - that the GT Masters will also have its first race.
schwaebische.de.113555.16: From July 31, the 33 super sports cars will race through Lusatia.
schwaebische.de.113555.17: But Zimmermann, who is one of 15 newcomers to the series, knows the track.
schwaebische.de.113555.18: In 2015 he was last guest at the Motodrom.
schwaebische.de.113555.19: "It worked quickly and I didn't have to get used to the track," says Zimmermann, who competes for the Graf Zeppelin racing community in Friedrichshafen.
schwaebische.de.113555.20: "The Lausitzring has many fast passages that you have to hit optimally in order to be fast".
schwaebische.de.113555.21: How fast Zimmermann really is then, that will find out in two weeks.
schwaebische.de.113555.22: "Of course the teams play a little bit of poker in the tests," he says.
schwaebische.de.113555.23: "In the end we are very satisfied and look forward to the first weekend at the Lausitzring".
schwaebische.de.113555.24: The race in Brandenburg will be the start of a tightly packed calendar.
schwaebische.de.113555.25: There are seven races up until the beginning of November.
schwaebische.de.113555.26: The current state of affairs is that no spectators will be admitted - but there is a prominent guest.
schwaebische.de.113555.27: In mid-August at the Nürburgring, ex-Formula 1 driver Niko Hülkenberg will grip the GT steering wheel.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.1: British Transport Minister caught off guard by quarantine decision
wienerzeitung.at.136148.2: The decision by the British government to quarantine holidaymakers in Spain for two weeks after their return has caught the country's transport minister off guard, according to press reports.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.3: According to this, Grant Shapps is currently on vacation in Spain, of all places, while his colleagues at home decided on the measure on Saturday.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.4: Because of the corona numbers rising again in Spain, the cabinet in London removed the country from the list of countries from which entry without quarantine requirements is possible.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.5: The new regulation applies from today, Sunday, so Shapps will also have to be quarantined after his return.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.6: In Austria, the government has also imposed quarantine measures for returnees.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.7: But for those who are just on vacation on the cut-off date, the rule only applies from Saturday, August 1st, and was not introduced overnight.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.8: By the way, Spain is currently considered one of the "safe countries" in Austria for which no quarantine is required in Austria.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.9: "Many ministers must have known in advance that there is a possibility that a quarantine would be imposed on holidaymakers in Spain," said Labor MP Diane Abbot.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.10: "But apparently nobody bothered to let Grant Shapps know."
wienerzeitung.at.136148.11: Less than a month after the end of the Corona emergency in Spain and the end of the strict curfew, the number of infections in the country is rising again.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.12: Virologists blame the nightlife in particular for the renewed spread.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.13: Spain is one of the most popular holiday destinations for the British.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.14: The British government is currently advising against unnecessary travel to mainland Spain; the Canary Islands and Balearic Islands, which are particularly popular with British holidaymakers, are excluded from this.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.15: So far, more than 272,000 infections with the novel corona virus and more than 28,000 deaths have been registered in Spain.
mz-web.de.376126.1: Russia: Navy Day: Putin announces hypersonic weapons for warships
mz-web.de.376126.2: On Navy Day, Russian President Vladimir Putin announced that warships would be equipped with state-of-the-art hypersonic weapons.
mz-web.de.376126.3: With these weapons, which are unique in the world, the combat capabilities of the Russian naval forces would be expanded, Putin said on Sunday in St. Petersburg at the central naval parade.
mz-web.de.376126.4: The Ministry of Defense also informed the Interfax agency about successful tests of the zirconium hypersonic missile built for the Navy.
mz-web.de.376126.5: The hypersonic weapons have a multiple of the speed of sound of around 343 meters per second.
mz-web.de.376126.6: They are seen as the weapons of the future.
mz-web.de.376126.8: It was said that the Poseidon underwater torpedo, which can be equipped with nuclear weapons, will continue to be built.
mz-web.de.376126.9: The planned sea drone is planned to destroy coastal targets.
mz-web.de.376126.10: The president, who also drove a military boat himself, said that this year alone 40 new ships would be put into service with the individual naval associations of the largest country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.11: Russia has such a large coastal area as no other country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.12: The Navy has been protecting Russia reliably for 300 years, Putin said on the day, which is celebrated by sailors across the country.
mz-web.de.376126.13: The naval forces also celebrated Navy Day with parades in many other Russian coastal towns.
mz-web.de.376126.14: In Syria, where Russia is fighting alongside ruler Bashar al-Assad, the military demonstrated strength at a weapons show in the Mediterranean port of Tartu.
mz-web.de.376126.16: A video published by the Ministry of Defense showed not only warships, including a submarine, but also attack helicopters and jets.
tt.com.149061.2: Washington - The first hurricane of this year's season over the Atlantic has hit land in Texas.
tt.com.149061.3: Life-threatening floods, strong winds and heavy rains now threatened parts of the US state, said the National Hurricane Center of the US climate agency NOAA on Sunday night (local time).
tt.com.149061.4: Governor Greg Abbott declared a state of emergency in numerous counties.
tt.com.149061.5: The corona pandemic, which is rampant in Texas, makes the work of the helpers more difficult, Abbott said according to the US media.
tt.com.149061.7: "Every hurricane is a tremendous challenge," Abbott said, according to the Houston Chronicle.
tt.com.149061.8: Turning to the Texas cyclone, he added, "This challenge is complicated and is made worse when you consider that it is sweeping through an area that is the most Covid-19 hit area in the state."
tt.com.149061.9: According to the Johns Hopkins University, around 5,000 people have died in Texas alone as a result of the corona pandemic.
tt.com.149061.10: Abbott cautioned people who would have to leave their homes.
tt.com.149061.11: You should not disregard practices "to which we have become used", such as wearing masks, said the governor, according to the broadcaster CBS.
tt.com.149061.12: It is important that everyone keeps their distance.
tt.com.149061.13: Therefore, hotel rooms have also been made available in some places.
tt.com.149061.14: In addition, emergency shelters should be tested for Corona.
tt.com.149061.15: Damage had initially only been reported from the coastal town of Port Mansfield.
tt.com.149061.17: According to the authorities, "Hanna" hit land on the island of Padre Island just off the Texan coast with wind speeds of up to 150 kilometers per hour.
tt.com.149061.18: The tropical storm had previously been upgraded to the lowest level hurricane.
tt.com.149061.19: For the stretch of coast from Port Mansfield to Sargent, a storm surge warning was initially issued and later withdrawn.
tt.com.149061.20: Authorities expected a slowdown as "Hanna" moved further inland and headed for northeast Mexico.
tt.com.149061.22: In the Pacific, hurricane "Douglas" was on its way to Hawaii on Sunday night with wind speeds of around 150 kilometers per hour.
tt.com.149061.23: However, the Hurricane Center expected it to continue to weaken.
tt.com.149061.24: According to the forecast, it will be near the largest islands in Hawaii on Sunday (local time) - then as a storm just below the hurricane threshold.
tt.com.149061.25: According to a forecast from May, NOAA was expecting an above-average hurricane season over the Atlantic this year.
tt.com.149061.26: From June to the end of November, up to ten hurricanes can be expected, of which up to six could become very strong cyclones, the authority had said.
tt.com.149061.27: On average there are six hurricanes over the Atlantic each year, three of which develop into storms of great strength.
tt.com.149061.28: In view of the available climate data and the higher water temperature in the Atlantic and the Caribbean, the probability of a normal season is only 30 percent, and that of a below-average season is only ten percent, it was said at the time.
tt.com.149061.29: US President Donald Trump wrote on Twitter that his administration is closely monitoring the storms and is in contact with the affected states.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.1: Four goals denied: video assistant "punishes" Sassuolo
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.2: Sassuolo's Filip Djuricic was denied two goals
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.3: Naples - four goals scored, four goals denied: Sassuolo Calcio experienced a pitch-black evening at 0: 2 (0: 1) at SSC Napoli in the Italian soccer league Serie A - and was really angry with the video assistant of the referee.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.4: "A festival of no goals for Sassuolo.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.5: The VAR has never acted so hard against a team ", commented the" Corriere dello Sport ".
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.6: Hosts Naples had taken the lead in the 8th minute with a goal from full-back Elseid Hisaj, while Filip Djuricic cheered the equalizer in the 32nd minute.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.7: The Video Assistant Referee (VAR) withdrew the goal because of an offside position.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.8: Five minutes later Djuricic shot the ball back into the net - again the VAR intervened.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.9: The referee team also took back the goals of attackers Francesco Caputo (50th) and Domenico Berardi (61st) following information from the VAR.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.10: In stoppage time Allan made the 2-0 final for Naples and the bitter evening for Sassuolo perfect.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.11: "For Sassuolo the VAR is worse than a speed trap on the street and punishes Sassuolo like no other team before.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.12: The new technology is setting records ", writes the" Gazzetta dello Sport ".
wn.de.700404.2: Munich (dpa) - The start of the hot preparation phase for the Champions League began with a setback for double winners FC Bayern.
wn.de.700404.3: After a short vacation and a few days of training, Hansi Flick, who recovered "reasonably well", has to think about how he can rebuild his successful defense after the injury of world champion Benjamin Pavard after the first team training.
wn.de.700404.4: The Frenchman, who has the third most minutes played behind captain Manuel Neuer and midfielder Joshua Kimmich, suffered a ligament injury on his left tarsus and threatens to miss out on decisive top-flight duels.
wn.de.700404.5: In the dreadful weather in Munich, the right-back broke off a training game and was driven off the field in a golf kart.
wn.de.700404.6: How long the unrestricted regular player has to pause in the fight for the title is open.
wn.de.700404.7: It will be difficult to play in the second leg of the second leg against Chelsea on August 8, but the 24-year-old can hope for the final tournament that begins in Lisbon on August 12.
wn.de.700404.8: Bayern do not want to be stopped by the mishap from training on Sunday.

salzburg.com.306641.1: Formula 1 needs a special rule to choose its world champion
salzburg.com.306641.2: Since it is not possible to drive on the required number of continents, the FIA has to improvise in order to award the world title.
salzburg.com.306641.3: All America races have been canceled.
salzburg.com.306641.4: The racing calendar is becoming more and more specific
salzburg.com.306641.5: The racing calendar for the current Formula 1 season continues to take shape.
salzburg.com.306641.6: In addition to the ten confirmed Grand Prix, three more race tracks were added during the week.
salzburg.com.306641.7: In October, the Nürburgring in Germany and Portimão, Portugal will take place.
salzburg.com.306641.8: On November 1st, Lewis Hamilton and Co. will fight for championship points on the traditional Italian race track in Imola.
salzburg.com.306641.9: As things stand at the moment, the 2020 racing calendar includes 13 races.
salzburg.com.306641.10: "We are delighted that we continue to make great progress in completing our plans for the 2020 season," said Formula 1 boss Chase Carey.
salzburg.com.306641.11: A total of 15 to 18 races in the premier class of motorsport are to be completed in this extraordinary season.
salzburg.com.306641.12: Formula 1 wants to conclude its season in Asia.
salzburg.com.306641.13: The final racing calendar is to be fixed and published in the coming weeks.
salzburg.com.306641.14: Before the already officially targeted races in Bahrain and Abu Dhabi in December, according to media reports, appearances in Vietnam and Malaysia could take place at the end of November.
salzburg.com.306641.15: Regulations require races on three continents
salzburg.com.306641.16: The Formula 1 regulations require at least races on three continents for the World Championship to be awarded.
salzburg.com.306641.17: Even if, as currently planned, only two continents are driven, there should be a world champion.
salzburg.com.306641.18: With the help of a special rule, the FIA wants to award the titles on the basis of "exceptional circumstances" due to the coronavirus pandemic.
salzburg.com.306641.19: The traditional start of the season in Australia in March had to be canceled at short notice due to the impending corona crisis.
salzburg.com.306641.20: A return to the continent this year is not an issue.
salzburg.com.306641.21: In addition, Formula 1 will not be visiting America this year.
salzburg.com.306641.22: The rejection is met with criticism in Brazil
salzburg.com.306641.23: Due to the tense corona situation, the races in Canada, the USA, Mexico and Brazil will not take place.
salzburg.com.306641.24: "We look forward to being with them again next season," said Carey.
salzburg.com.306641.25: The cancellation of the American races met with criticism, especially in Brazil: "The cancellation did not come as a surprise to us, but we cannot accept the reasons for it," said Tamas Rohonyi, promoter of the Grand Prix in São Paulo.
salzburg.com.306641.26: The number of infections in the São Paulo area is significantly lower than in other regions of Brazil.
salzburg.com.306641.27: The concerns of some teams about not wanting to drive in Brazil would also not justify a cancellation.
salzburg.com.306641.28: One is prepared for the required security measures.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.1: Greta Thunberg: Evil eye against Donald Trump went around the world
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.2: Greta Thunberg spoke about her meeting with US President Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.3: Greta Thunberg was a guest on Stephen Colbert's well-known late-night show via video and revealed in an interview what she had in mind when she met Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.4: Klimatkivist Greta Thunberg was a guest on a popular US late night show via video switch.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.5: Among other things, she told of her fight against the mighty of the world.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.6: The teenager also spoke about her famous "evil eye" when she met Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.7: New York City - Over the past two years, climate activist Greta Thunberg has drawn attention to herself with her tireless commitment to the "Fridays For Future" movement.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.8: Now she spoke on a well-known late-night show about her plans for the future and her encounter with US President Donald Trump at the UN climate summit last year.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.9: Latenight presenter Stephen Colbert welcomed 17-year-old Thunberg to your show on Tuesday and conducted a lengthy interview with the Swede.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.10: She not only talked about her fight against climate change, but also about her conflict with the mighty powers of the world.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.11: "There are some things that surprised me," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.12: "How far people go to direct the focus away from the climate crisis," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.13: "Everything from organized hate campaigns to threats just because a group of children takes to the streets," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.14: She is said to be "funny" by heads of state and leading politicians who mock her on social media or even try to silence her, because the reactions show her "because they have no other answer".
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.15: It became particularly interesting at the end of the interview, when Greta Thunberg was approached about a well-known scene in which she cast an angry look at US President Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.16: At the UN climate summit in New York in 2019, for which the activist sailed across the Atlantic, her expressive gaze was caught by the cameras and has since been seen by countless people on the Internet.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.17: A GIF was created from the short clip, an animated image that ultimately became one of the most frequently used images for Trump opponents.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.18: But what did the 17-year-old think about the US president at that moment?
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.19: To Stephen Colbert's relatively open question, she replied only briefly and dryly: "To be honest, I don't think that needs any further explanation."
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.20: The experienced satirist Colbert had probably not expected the quick-witted answer and disappeared from the picture with a laugh.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.21: With her "How dare you?" Speech on the principles of climate protection, she was remembered by many at the climate conference.

mittelbayerische.de.307290.1: Fleetwood Mac co-founder Peter Green has died
mittelbayerische.de.307290.2: His life was like a roller coaster ride: After a rapid ascent with Fleetwood Mac, it went steeply downhill and then slowly up again.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.3: Now the blues rock guitarist Peter Green has died at the age of 73.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.4: Ingenious guitarist, drug junkie, cult supporter: the co-founder of the band Fleetwood Mac, Peter Green, is dead.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.5: He died peacefully in his sleep at the age of 73, family members said in an official statement on Saturday, and another statement would be announced for the next few days.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.6: Top musicians like Peter Frampton recognized Green as one of the best blues and rock guitarists.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.7: Mick Fleetwood spoke in an emotional reaction of a "monumental loss" for all past and present members of the band Fleetwood Mac.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.8: The drummer Fleetwood and the guitarist Green founded the now legendary band in London in 1967, and his dreamy instrumental hit "Albatross" has not been forgotten to this day.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.9: The musician's life ("The End Of The Game", "In The Skies") was like a rollercoaster ride.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.10: With Fleetwood Mac Green experienced a rapid rise - but the band celebrated their greatest successes without him.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.11: Among other things, there should have been a dispute because Green wanted to donate all of the group's profits to charity.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.12: He began to appear in wide robes and with a large crucifix.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.13: Psychological problems are also said to have played a role.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.14: Just three years after it was founded, Green left the band in 1970.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.16: The blues rock guitarist suffered from substance abuse and schizophrenia, biographers reported.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.17: For a long time Green was treated in psychiatry.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.18: During much of the 1970s, the musician disappeared from the scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.19: He is said to have lived on the street at times, worked as a cemetery gardener and spent time in an Israeli kibbutz.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.20: Green was born in 1946 to a Jewish working class family in Bethnal Green, London.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.21: From a young age he was enthusiastic about US blues musicians such as BB King and Muddy Waters.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.22: At the age of eleven he learned the first guitar fingerings.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.23: The teenager began playing the guitar professionally at the age of 15 and five years later got the chance to take the stage as lead guitarist for the instrumental band Peter B's Looners.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.24: A little later he was hired to replace his idol Eric Clapton with the Bluesbreakers.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.25: In the midst of the blues boom, Green founded Fleetwood Mac in the summer of 1967 together with his Bluesbreakers colleagues Mick Fleetwood and John McVie.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.26: The song "Albatross" composed by Green gave the group their first number 1 hit in the winter of 1968/69 and catapulted them to the top of the British music scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.27: But the rapid rise soon showed its downsides: Green couldn't cope with the media hype, his experiments with the drug LSD became more and more extreme.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.28: He later commented on life between music and addiction in an interview: "The worst thing that has happened to me in life is the drugs - the best was to land a number 1 hit".
mittelbayerische.de.307290.29: Towards the end of the decade, Green surprisingly achieved a respectable success in 1979 with an album inspired by religious themes.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.30: Fleetwood Mac swam meanwhile without him in a new formation on a wave of success.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.31: Her album "Rumors", released in 1977, sold more than 40 million copies worldwide.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.32: Despite various small solo successes, Green did not make a major comeback until he started again in 1996 with a group of musician friends.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.33: The British Daily Telegraph spoke of a rock star who had returned to earth.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.34: Free of drugs, Green released a few albums with the Peter Green Splinter Group until the band split up in 2004.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.35: For music experts he was already a blues legend during his lifetime - and with his smooth sound one of the most influential guitarists of the past decades.
